author: ebrondol
body:
A new set of plots have been added in the "extended" option for the MultiTrackerValidation. These plots contain useful information about the simulation part of the tracking - such as the distribution of Tracking Particles as a function of the SimHits.

Absolutely no difference are expected in the reconstruction process.

Thanks to @makortel for the precious help
Informing @VinInn @rovere
title: Adding new set of plots to the MTV
